content: couple please not too many it won t need it to adjust the fit if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to contact me at http //www ravelry com/people/joht or support@jotorr co uk if you want to sell any socks you make from this then be my guest it would be your hard work not mine though if you become rich from it hen please feel free to send chocolate helpful links calculator for number of stitches based on gauge and size https //www jotorr co uk/vanilla-sock-calculations/ calculator for where to start gussets https //www jotorr co uk/sock-gusset-calculations-2/ vanillasockwithgusset&choiceofheel v7 byjotorr 8of9 wwwj otorr co uk copyright2014 worksheet if you find the instructions above a bit daunting or want to double check then why not use this worksheet to help the worked example is in inches calculation your numbers example a measure around your foot in 9 inches or cm measure the length of your foot b 10 in inches or cm c how many stitches per inch/cm 8 how many row per inch/cm d 11 a x c calculate how many foot = 9 x 8 stitches = 72 x 0 9 = 72 x 0 9 = 64 8 e round to nearest = 64 even number calculate how many stitches to e / 6 = 64/6 cast on each needle = 10 67 f round to nearest = 10 even number calculate how much to knit e x 0 75 = 64 x 0 75 before starting gusset increases = 48 g / d = 48/11 = 4 36 b - g = 10 - 4 36 = 5 64 - 0 25 /0 75cm = 5 64 - 0 25 = 5 39 inches calculate how many to increase sole stitches = 64/2 for each gusset = e / 2 = 32 h / 2 = 32/2 = 16 calculate how many to expand h / 2 5 = 16/2 5 each gusset by = 6 4 round to nearest 6 whole number calculate how many to wrap on e x 0 3 = 64 x 0 3 each side = 19 2 round up to nearest 20 whole number - 2 = 20 - 2 = 18 / 2 = 18 / 2 = 9 round down to 9 nearest whole number vanillasockwithgusset&choiceofheel v7 byjotorr 9of9 wwwj otorr co uk copyright2014
